properties.name: scheme
properties.description: 'http' or 'https', used to build URIs involved in authentication and can be used in 'gateway-uri', 'bao-loc-api-uri' or 'ui-uri'

properties.name: oauth2-client-id
properties.description: client-id used for client registration configuration and resource_access roles

properties.name: oauth2-client-secret
properties.description: client-secret used for client registration configuration

properties.name: keycloak-host
properties.description: Scheme, hostname and port for Keycloak server

properties.name: ui-external-uri
properties.description: Base URI for UI. Used to build URI in email to trainers when a skill-test is submitted.
